definition: to ascertain/to act on/to criticize/to pass on/classifier for batches, lots, military flights/tier (for the ranking of universities and colleges)
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc

sentences.english: Bensley beat on the car before it sped away, Heyse said.
sentences.chinese: 在車開走之前，該男子批命捶打這輛車。

sentences.english: Willing to grant life to those who ask and a lot of life advice.
sentences.chinese: 樂意爲問命者批命和多多提點。

definition: to have one's fortune read/system of fortune telling based on a person's date and time of birth, according to 干支 (sexagenary cycle)
to divine using the trigrams/fortune telling
fortune telling based on the subject's face
to tell fortune by reading the subject's facial features
fortune-teller who uses the subject's face for his prognostication
one's birth data for astrological purposes, combined from year, month, day, hour, heavenly trunk and earthly branch
the character 8 or 八/birthdate characters used in fortune-telling
to tell sb's fortune using divinatory trigrams
Zi Wei Dou Shu, a form of Chinese fortune-telling
divination based on the eight characters of one's birth date
